resources.string: Submit your feedback on consent sharing.\nThis is the part when you gave permission to share you data via digi.me.
How happy were you sharing the data, even when you knew it would be processed outside of your device?
Are you a Monday Moaner, a Wednesday Wonderer, a Friday Fighter, a Sunday Slumberer …?
You don\'t even need to give us access to your social accounts as we use digi.me to protect your data.
You need to install digi.me first
Use digi.me to protect your data. You get to control what data is shared and with who
1. Add your services to digi.me\n2. Come back here\n3. Click open to authorize access to your last 3 months social posts
We need to analyse your content using our servers
